original_text: And there were set there six waterpots of stone, after the manner of the purifying of the Jews, containing two or three firkins apiece.
korean_text: 거기에 유대인의 정결 예식을 따라 두세 통 드는 돌항아리 여섯이 놓였는지라

sentences.original_text: after the manner of the purifying of the Jews
containing two or three firkins apiece
sentences.korean_translation: 각각 두세 통의 물을 담을 수 있었습니다
